channel.title: Kibi on purpleidea.com
channel.description: Recent content in Kibi on purpleidea.com

item.title: really well written article
item.description: i’m sure that most (if not all) of the technically inclined readers know about this already, but since it’s such a well written article (and detailed in the right places), i felt i should bump up it’s link count. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Binary_prefix as an aside, i really liked Knuth’s suggestion; in the meantime let’s use the stupid kibi’s. You can hire James and his team at m9rx corporation. You can follow James on Mastodon for more frequent updates and other random thoughts.
